What's everybody's favorite teams? I'm adding a condition: no teams 
with archmages (since you can easily defeat 99% of scenarios just by 
summoning enough fire elementals) or mages (since you can easily 
defeat 99% of scenarios just by freezing time and then attacking).

* * *

I also want to add that is possible for a faerie to use energy on its 
special attack - even though it has none. [Gotta love having a killer 
faerie on my new (I've lost track of how money I've spent) team.]
